companyDescriptionPart1: ElGameya is a ROSCA Model based mobile application with
companyDescriptionPart2: an integrated marketplace that offers its users exclusive
appDescription: ElGameya’s app facilitates the management of the ROSCA cycle, Users can either use it as a platform to digitize their private money cycles, or get matched to users with similar saving/lending capabilities in a public circle. ElGameya’s app also features a built-in marketplace enabling users to access exclusive discounted products as a cash-out option.
homeScreenDescription: The main page is a display of the roles available to participate in
chatBotDescription: Chat Bot is one of the methods and ways to help and answer common inquiries
myCycleDescription: A page detailing the association's details and the roles available to participate in it
dealsDescription: Shows you your associations that you have subscribed to
profileDescription: A screen that enables you to control your personal page and know your current balance
myScoresDescription: A screen showing the documents required for you to join us
titleQ1: Why is El Gameya better than any traditional offline money circle?
answerQ1L1: Ensuring your privacy: nobody knows when you are getting your payout.
answerQ1L2: Ensuring your security: all user customers sign a legally binding contract.
answerQ1L5: Gameya is available in Egypt from Cairo to Aswan
answerQ1L7: Available at a click of a button.
titleQ2: What are the money circles you offer?
answerQ2L1: Money Circles values start from 2,500 EGP and could reach up to 100,000 EGP.
answerQ2L2: Installments start from 500 EGP per month and up to 10,000 EGP per month.
answerQ2L3: You can choose between 3 different durations: 5 Months, 7 Months, and 10 Months.
answerQ3L1: El Gameya is registered in the General Authority for Investment, its commercial registration number is 131569, and its tax card number is 578-350-723
titleQ4: Why should I trust that other people are going to pay ?
answerQ4L1: Each user has to sign a legally binding contract after undergoing credit assessment from our side to ensure that all users can pay their installments. In case other users fail to pay their due amounts, El Gameya  covers their share to make sure you get your full payout.
rateingInfo: Rating : 4.3 on apple store / 4 on google
areExcitedTo: We are excited to talk to you.
faqsAnthoerFotter: FAQS . TERMS OF USE . PRIVACY NOTICE . COOKIE NOTICE
